name: Maxwell Bentil
bio: Mr. Maxwell Bentil brings 5 years of experience in Development Planning and Management. He is currently a Planning Officer at the Secretariat of the Ghana Institute of Planning (GIP). He holds a Master’s degree in Planning from KNUST. Until his engagement with the GIP, he had some working experience with the following institutions: MATT-MARI Rescue Foundation, Central Region – Planning Officer, 2019, Cocoa Marketing Company (GH) Ltd, Estate Department, Accra – Assistant Clerk (2019 to 2020), Kumasi Metropolitan Assembly, Physical Planning Department – Intern (2017), Ghana Statistical Service – Enumerator, 2020 Population and Housing Census (2020). Mr. Maxwell Bentil is a self-motivating, adaptable, well-organized, and result-oriented individual. He is passionate about Project Management, Project Analysis, and Activity Coordinating.
